title.rendered: Successful Completion of EU-Funded Training Empowers Civil Servants and Professional Organizations in Professional Qualification Recognition

content.rendered:
Thrilled to announce the successful completion of a 5-day Training of Trainers on “Mutual Recognition of Professional Qualifications for Civil Servants and Professional organisations,” as part of the EU-funded project, “Support to Recognition of Professional Qualifications” implemented by WEglobal.
 
Over the course of five intensive days, participants engaged in comprehensive training designed to enhance their understanding and implementation of Mutual Recognition of Professional Qualifications. This vital initiative aims to streamline the recognition process, fostering greater mobility and collaboration across professions within the EU.
 
Certificates were awarded to all participants who successfully completed the program. Their dedication and commitment to professional growth and cross-border cooperation are truly commendable.
 
Here are some highlights from the certification event! Join in celebrating the achievements of these dedicated civil servants and professionals who are now better equipped to advance mutual recognition of professional qualifications.
